room_title: Escape room "The Minerva Project" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: Excellent game with an actor/skit good enough that it was sometimes difficult to tell which components of conversation were real vs game related. Least scary escape room for my child (6yo) so far as well!

room_title: Escape room "The Minerva Project" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: Great theme and even greater feeling from the moment you walk in the door. Character felt real and the futuristic feel of the whole theme was well worth the drive. Great job and look forward to coming back.

room_title: Escape room "The Minerva Project" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: We had a group of 10 people. What a fabulous time! I would highly recommend this. Great family get together. The people were amazing and friendly.

room_title: Escape room "The Minerva Project" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: My first escape room and it was phenomenal! They beautifully accommodated our group of 12 and we all had a great time! Canâ€™t wait to go back and do the next part!! Highly, highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "The Minerva Project" by Decode Detroit in Ann Arbor
review: Absolutely fantastic! Puzzles were challenging but fair, and I really enjoyed the storyline aspect of it! For reference, my friends and I participated in and completed Part 1 which is the Minerva Project. Highly recommend to anybody interested!
